name: Together Alone (ruin13)
description:
Developed in a bit over two weeks for the 32bit Spring Cleaning 2022 jam, and inspired by games such as Silent Hill and Deadly Premonition, Together Alone is an interactive horror experience that mixes 2D art with 3D environments.

Meet a cast of unique ghost characters, escape the grasp of a relentless chaser and survive the haunt.

Controls:
WASD - Move
F - Interact
Shift - Sprint
Space - Advance text

Artist - EzzyDraws (Twitter)
Composer - Bis_mii (Spotify / Soundcloud)
Programmer - RUIN13 (Twitter)
